person.name: Zsolt Felföldi
person.bio: Zsolt Felföldi is a Go Ethereum core developer working with the Ethereum Foundation since early 2015. During this time he mainly focused on the Geth "light client" project (LES) and has also been involved in a new experimental peer discovery DHT project codenamed "discv5".

person2.name: Adam
person2.bio: Math-Philosophy > Programming (Java, Python, Node.js, Clojure) > Startups > Prezi > Ethereum. Programmer > Psychotherapist (Gestalt-therapy) > Speaker (TEDx) > Writer (poetry, (non)fiction) > DevOps > Scrum Master > Engineering Manager > Product Manager.

person3.name: ChrisChinchilla
person3.bio: Loves to explain tech to the World. Currently working for a handful of Ethereum and non-Ethereum technical projects. Also a Podcaster, video maker and writer of interactive fiction.
